songs.title: Say My Name/Independent Women/Bootylicious/Survivor (Medley)
songs.lyrics:
____________________________
SAY MY NAME

[Chorus: All]
Say my name, say my name
If no one is around you
Say baby I love you
If you ain't runnin' game
Say my name, say my name
You actin kinda shady
Ain't callin' me baby
Why you don´t say my name?

[Verse 1: Normani & Lauren]
Any other day I would call
You would say, baby how's your day?
But today it ain't the same
Every other word is
Uh huh, yeah okay
Could it be that you
Are at the crib with another lady?
If you took it there first of all
Let me say, I am not the one
To sit around and be played
So prove yourself to me
I'm the girl that you claim
Why don't you say the things
That you said to me yesterday?

[Pre-Chorus: All & Ally & (Dinah) & {Normani} & Camila]
I know you say that I am assuming things
Something's going down thats the way it seems
Shouldn't be a reason why you're acting strange
(If nobody's holding you back from me)
Cause I know how you usually do
{When you say everything to me times two}
Why can't you just tell the truth?
If somebody's there then tell me who

[Chorus: All]
Say my name, say my name
If no one is around you
Say baby I love you
If you ain't runnin' game
Say my name, say my name
You actin' kinda shady
Ain't callin' me baby
Why you don´t say my name?
____________________________
INDEPENDENT WOMEN PT.I

[Verse 1: All & Camila & Dinah]
Question: Tell me what you think about me
I buy my own diamonds and I buy my own rings
Only ring your cell-y when I'm feelin lonely
When it's all over please get up and leave
Question: Tell me how you feel about this
Try to control me boy you get dismissed
Pay my own fun, oh and I pay my own bills
Always 50 50 in relationships

[Pre-Chorus: Ally & All]
The shoes on my feet (I've bought it)
The clothes I'm wearing (I've bought it)
The rock I'm rockin' (I've bought it)
'Cause I depend on me (If I wanted)
The watch you're wearin' (I'll buy it)
The house I live in (I've bought it)
The car I'm driving (I've bought it)
'Cause I depend on me (I depend on me)

[Chorus: All]
All the women who are independent
Throw your hands up at me
All the honeys who makin' money
Throw your hands up at me
All the mommas who profit dollas
Throw your hands up at me
All the ladies who truly feel me
Throw your hands up at me
____________________________
BOOTYLICIOUS

[Intro: All]
Kelly, can you handle this?
Michelle, can you handle this?
Beyonce, can you handle this?
I don't think they can handle this!
____________________________
SURVIVOR

[Chorus: All]
I'm a survivor, I'm not gon give up
I'm not gon stop, I'm gon work harder
I'm a survivor, I'm gonna make it
I will survive, keep on survivin'
Oh oh oh oh
Cause my mama taught me better than that
I'm a survivor, I'm not gon give up
I'm not gon stop, I'm gon work harder
I'm a survivor, I'm gonna make it
I will survive, keep on survivin'
I'm a survivor
